name: PracticeBrain
tag_list: practicebrain, doctor-com, health-platforms, acquired--acquisition, practice-management, medical, health-care, healthcare, patient, doctor, hospital, physician, messaging, alerts, communications, secure, cloud
overview:
PracticeBrain is a patient communications and practice optimization company that partners with doctors, dentists, therapists, and other healthcare professionals to streamline staff & patient communications, maximize office productivity, increase revenues, and ensure patient loyalty and satisfaction.

PracticeBrain’s PracticeGrow™ website “widget” empowers patients to request appointments from a practice website and receive convenient appointment reminder messages via SMS, email or auto call.

Other PracticeBrain modules support practice staff with comprehensive rules-driven alerts, real-time practice analytics, referrals tracking, and a complete practice management solution that scales across multiple facilities and departments.

The result is a single solution designed to improve patient experience while simultaneously increasing practice efficiency and profitability though reduced overhead and fewer no-show visits.

PracticeBrain is a used by leading medical and health services offices including one of country’s largest multi-location physical therapy practices.

Headquartered in New York, PracticeBrain was founded in 2010 by veterans of the healthare technology space and privately funded.

At the start of 2012, PracticeBrain was wholly acquired by Health Platforms, Inc, who’ve integrated PracticeBrain technology into their Doctor.com platform.
